(2) Baitul Mokarram massacre
(3) Shapla Chottor massacre

In her attempt for a closure about the 1971 war, she has committed these events of crimes against humanity. Now, for a closure of the trio massacres, is it going to be the beginning of a new trial for her and her team of killers? True, the nation awaits to see a trial against Hasina for her fascist BKSALI actions of murder, and anti state India love directed against the sovereign state of Bangladesh?
